text: I want to check in the Facebook Messenger chatflow if in the existing conversation visitor has an associated email address, however in the if/then branch it doesn't allow me to choose conversations visitor email = known. Do you know if there's other way to check it? Thanks!
<@U01QVR44MEY> could you use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/analytics/events|Events API> and leverage a custom code action to extract the response to a designated property?

Couldn't you do this nocode? 

Deal hits lost is enrollment trigger

If contact has a deal that has deal stage known and deal stage is any except lost then exit

Else, continue

Then do stuff
